targets.expr: sum by(filename, event) (count_over_time({filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event", timestamp="timestamp", flavor="flavor" | label_format timestamp="{{__timestamp__ | unixEpoch | mulf 1000}}" | event =~ "runner_start|runner_stop|runner_installed" | flavor=~"$flavor" | timestamp >= ${__from} [$__range]))

sum by(filename) (sum_over_time({filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event", crashed_runners="crashed_runners", timestamp="timestamp", flavor="flavor" | label_format timestamp="{{__timestamp__ | unixEpoch | mulf 1000}}" | event = `reconciliation` | flavor=~"$flavor" | timestamp >= ${__from} | unwrap crashed_runners [$__range]))

panels.description:
Shows the number of available (and max expected) runners per application. Note: Available equals idle after reconciliation and is not a real-time metric as it is only updated after each reconciliation interval for each unit.

Note that there is no maximum expected number of reactive runners.

targets.expr: sum by(flavor)(last_over_time({filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",idle_runners="idle_runners",flavor="flavor" | event="reconciliation" | unwrap idle_runners[$__range]))

sum by(flavor)(last_over_time({filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",expected_runners="expected_runners",flavor="flavor" | __error__="" | event="reconciliation" | unwrap expected_runners[$__range]))

panels.title: Available Runners

panels.description: All aggregations are based on a 1-hour time period.

targets.expr: quantile_over_time(0.5,{filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",duration="queue_duration",flavor="flavor" | __error__="" | event="runner_start" | flavor=~"$flavor" | unwrap duration[1h]) by(filename)

quantile_over_time(0.95,{filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",duration="queue_duration",flavor="flavor" | __error__="" | event="runner_start" | flavor=~"$flavor" | unwrap duration[1h]) by(filename)

quantile_over_time(0.99,{filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",duration="queue_duration",flavor="flavor" | __error__="" | event="runner_start" | flavor=~"$flavor" | unwrap duration[1h]) by(filename)

max_over_time({filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",duration="queue_duration",flavor="flavor" | __error__="" | event="runner_start" | flavor=~"$flavor" | unwrap duration[1h]) by(filename)

panels.title: Job Queue Duration (Percentile)

panels.description: All aggregations are based on a 1-hour time period.

targets.expr: max_over_time({filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",duration="queue_duration",flavor="flavor" | __error__="" | event="runner_start" | flavor=~"$flavor" | unwrap duration[1h]) by(flavor)

panels.title: Max Job Queue Duration By Application

panels.description: All aggregations are based on a 1-hour time period.

targets.expr: quantile_over_time(0.5,{filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",duration="duration",flavor="flavor" | event="runner_installed" | flavor=~"$flavor" | unwrap duration[1h]) by(filename)

quantile_over_time(0.95,{filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",duration="duration",flavor="flavor" | event="runner_installed" | flavor=~"$flavor" | unwrap duration[1h]) by(filename)

quantile_over_time(0.99,{filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",duration="duration",flavor="flavor" | event="runner_installed" | flavor=~"$flavor" | unwrap duration[1h]) by(filename)

max_over_time({filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",duration="duration",flavor="flavor" | event="runner_installed" | flavor=~"$flavor" | unwrap duration[1h]) by(filename)

panels.title: Runner Installation Duration (Percentile)

panels.description:
This panel totals the number of active/idle/total expected runners reported by charm units after reconciliation.  Note that this is not a real-time metric and should only be used to identify trends or to investigate problems. A given point in time shows the aggregation of the last reported values from the reconciliation. This means, for example, that if the graph shows 10 idle runners at a particular time, it doesn't mean that there are 10 idle runners at that time, just that this is the most recently reported value. Also note that runners who are reported as idle at the time of reconciliation may become active immediately afterwards. And active runners may become offline/inactive.

There is no expected number of runners for runners in reactive mode, which means that the total number of idle + active runners could be greater than expected if reactive applications are not filtered out in this view.

targets.expr: sum by(filename)(last_over_time({filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",idle_runners="idle_runners",flavor="flavor" | event="reconciliation" | flavor=~"$flavor" | unwrap idle_runners[60m]))

sum by(filename)(last_over_time({filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",active_runners="active_runners",flavor="flavor" | event="reconciliation" | flavor=~"$flavor" | unwrap active_runners[60m]))

sum by(filename)(last_over_time({filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",expected_runners="expected_runners",flavor="flavor" | __error__="" | event="reconciliation" | flavor=~"$flavor" | unwrap expected_runners[60m]))

panels.title: Runners after Reconciliation

panels.description: All aggregations are based on a 1-hour time period.

targets.expr: quantile_over_time(0.5,{filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",duration="duration",flavor="flavor" | event="reconciliation" | flavor=~"$flavor" | unwrap duration[1h]) by(filename)

quantile_over_time(0.95,{filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",duration="duration",flavor="flavor" | event="reconciliation" | flavor=~"$flavor" | unwrap duration[1h]) by(filename)

quantile_over_time(0.99,{filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",duration="duration",flavor="flavor" | event="reconciliation" | flavor=~"$flavor" | unwrap duration[1h]) by(filename)

max_over_time({filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",duration="duration",flavor="flavor" | event="reconciliation" | flavor=~"$flavor" | unwrap duration[1h]) by(filename)

panels.title: Reconciliation Duration (Percentile)

panels.description:
The average actual reconciliation interval.

Unlike the Reconciliation Duration panel, this panel shows the time between the actual start of reconciliations. This is useful for identifying problems where the reconciliation itself is behaving normally, but the event itself is not being scheduled as expected.

targets.expr: (1 / sum by(flavor)(rate({filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",flavor="flavor" | event="reconciliation"[$__range])))

panels.title: Average Reconciliation Interval

panels.description: All aggregations are based on a 1-hour time period.

targets.expr: quantile_over_time(0.5,{filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",idle="idle",flavor="flavor" | event="runner_start" | flavor=~"$flavor" | unwrap idle[1h]) by(filename)

quantile_over_time(0.95,{filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",idle="idle",flavor="flavor" | event="runner_start" | flavor=~"$flavor" | unwrap idle[1h]) by(filename)

quantile_over_time(0.99,{filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",idle="idle",flavor="flavor" | event="runner_start" | flavor=~"$flavor" | unwrap idle[1h]) by(filename)

max_over_time({filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",idle="idle",flavor="flavor" | event="runner_start" | flavor=~"$flavor" | unwrap idle[1h]) by(filename)

panels.title: Runner Idle Duration (Percentile)

panels.description: Visualises the result from the runner's perspective.

targets.expr: sum by(status)(count_over_time({filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",flavor="flavor" | event="runner_stop" | json status="status",repo="repo" | flavor=~"$flavor" | repo=~"$repository"[1h]))

panels.title: Completion Status

panels.description: Visualises the result from the GitHub Actions workflow perspective.

targets.expr: sum by(job_conclusion)(count_over_time({filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",flavor="flavor" | event="runner_stop" | json job_conclusion="job_conclusion",repo="repo" | flavor=~"$flavor" | repo=~"$repository"[1h]))

panels.title: Job Conclusion

panels.description: Visualises the proportion of applications in use.

targets.expr: sum by(flavor)(count_over_time({filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",flavor="flavor" | event="runner_start" | json flavor="flavor",repo="repo" | flavor=~"$flavor" | repo=~"$repository"[1h]))

panels.title: Application proportion

panels.description: Visualises the http codes for repo policy check failures.

targets.expr: sum by(http_code)(count_over_time({filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",flavor="flavor" | event="runner_stop" | json status="status",repo="repo" | status="repo-policy-check-failure" | repo=~"$repository" | flavor=~"$flavor" | json http_code="status_info.code"[1h]))

panels.title: Repo Policy Check Failures

panels.description: Visualises the GitHub events that triggered a workflow run.

targets.expr: sum by(github_event)(count_over_time({filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",flavor="flavor" | event="runner_start" | json github_event="github_event",repo="repo" | flavor=~"$flavor" | repo=~"$repository"[1h]))

panels.title: GitHub Event

panels.description: All aggregations are based on a 1-hour time period.

targets.expr: quantile_over_time(0.5,{filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",job_duration="job_duration",status="status",flavor="flavor" | event="runner_stop" | status="normal" | flavor=~"$flavor" | unwrap job_duration[1h]) by(filename)

quantile_over_time(0.95,{filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",job_duration="job_duration",status="status",flavor="flavor" | event="runner_stop" | status="normal" | flavor=~"$flavor" | unwrap job_duration[1h]) by(filename)

quantile_over_time(0.99,{filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",job_duration="job_duration",status="status",flavor="flavor" | event="runner_stop" | status="normal" | flavor=~"$flavor" | unwrap job_duration[1h]) by(filename)

max_over_time({filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",job_duration="job_duration",status="status",flavor="flavor" | event="runner_stop" | status="normal" | flavor=~"$flavor" | unwrap job_duration[1h]) by(filename)

panels.title: Job Duration (Percentile)

panels.description: Visualises the number of jobs per repository.

targets.expr: sum by(repo)(count_over_time({filename="/var/log/github-runner-metrics.log", juju_application=~"$juju_application", juju_model=~"$juju_model", juju_model_uuid=~"$juju_model_uuid", juju_unit=~"$juju_unit"} | json event="event",flavor="flavor" | event="runner_start" | json repo="repo" | flavor=~"$flavor" | repo=~"$repository"[$__range]))

panels.title: Repositories

list.description: Specify the repositories that can be applied to a panel in the Jobs row. You can use a regular expression to match multiple repositories. Use .* to match all repositories.
list.label: Repository
list.name: repository

list.description: Specify the application that can be applied to a panel. You can use a regular expression to match multiple application. Use .* to match all applications.
list.label: Application
list.name: flavor
